name: Overpass
description:
Lisa has overslept once again and now she's in a hurry. You need to help her make it in time despite the obstacles in her way by drawing overpasses over these obstacles. Don't make them too steep, though; even the rock-climbing enthusiast Archie cannot get over them!

The game's intended controller is a drawing tablet, but due to coding reasons a mouse is also supported as a controller.
